ID,
NAME,
DESCRIPTION,
STATE,

mapper.update:
update ROLE
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update ROLE set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=BIGINT} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
